# Question

Write a function `wrap_string`. It iterates over words and it will add a new line each time a maximum `text_width::Int=10` would be exceeded. Provide an example

```julia
wrap_string(s::String; text_width::Int=10) = join(split(s, ' '), "\n")
```

Example:
```julia
julia> wrap_string("Hello, I am a nice string to wrap and see if it wraps correctly")
"Hello, I am
a nice string to
wrap and see if
it wraps correctly"
```
